name: Lipa Band: The Book
description: This colorful interactive story follows the Bug Band as they reach for music stardom! But do they have what it takes to keep going despite their grumpy neighbor and flighty fans?    25 beautifully animated screens;  3 play modes: listen and read, read with your parents, or watch as an animated story;  10 jam-tastic songs to dance along to;  Foster a love of reading!  Lipa Band: Reach for the Stars is an educational interactive book ideal for kids aged 5+.  Have you rocked your way to bug stardom? Discover other challenging and fun apps!  Enjoy voiceovers in your native language and even accent. Available in both British and American English, German, Spanish, Mexican Spanish, French, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Czech, Turkish, Polish, Arabic, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, Swedish, and Dutch!  Crafted by Lipa Learning, a community of educators and creative professionals dedicated to revolutionizing childhood development.  Lipa Learning For Kids. For Parents. For a Better Future. www.lipalearning.com  ---  Were working to make this game available on all Android devices.
